Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-53227 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.176.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-53227 affecting package kernel for versions less than 5.15.176.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
